price: Onyankopͻn, awurade foforͻ biara nnihͻ gyesε Ɔno nko ara, Ɔne Ahennwa kεseε no Wura no “.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
